      • check

        @RequestMapping(value="/check",
                method=POST)
public String check(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model mvcModel,
                                                                                 Writer writer,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 String url,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 String retDesired,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 Boolean autofix,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Behavior filter,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 Integer maxErrors,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                 String profile,
                                                                                 @ModelAttribute(value="normalizer")
                                                                                 org.biopax.paxtools.normalizer.Normalizer normalizer)
                                                                          throws IOException
        JSP pages and RESTful web services controller, the main one that checks BioPAX data. All parameter names are important, i.e., these are part of public API (for clients) Framework's built-in parameters:
        Parameters:
        request - the web request object (may contain multi-part data, i.e., multiple files uploaded)
        response -
        mvcModel - Spring MVC Model
        writer - HTTP response writer BioPAX Validator/Normalizer query parameters:
        url -
        retDesired -
        autofix -
        filter -
        maxErrors -
        profile -
        normalizer - binds to three boolean options: normalizer.fixDisplayName, normalizer.inferPropertyOrganism, normalizer.inferPropertyDataSource
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
